title: Fragments, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal
Technique: continuous and discontinuous supplementary in a plain weave foundation; only the metal wefts are bound to the front in a regular order
dimensions: Repeat H x W: 25 x 26.5 cm (9 13/16 x 10 7/16 in.)
description: Two parallel curving branches with clusters of flowers on an ivory background. The pattern is achieved by horizontally turning every other minimum unit and placing all units one on top of the other.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, mid-18th century.Medium: silk and metal
Technique: continuous and discontinuous supplementary in a plain weave foundation; only the metal wefts are bound to the front in a regular order. Gift of Marguerite E. Flynn. 1975-40-1-a,b.
